subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador appeared to clinch victory in the 94th Tour de France on Saturday, finishing fifth in the final time trial but riding fast enough to remain slightly ahead over all.
snippet: Alberto Contador appeared to clinch victory in the 94th Tour de France on Saturday, finishing fifth in the final time trial but riding fast enough to remain slightly ahead over all.
